dict.string:
About Bug Max Effect. When you collect a certain amount of Bug MAX units, your units will gain additional buffs!
Bug MAX effect works on all units. The more you collect, the stronger your characters will become.
You can check for how many Bug MAX characters you currently have at here.
You can check here for the Bug MAX effects that are currently activated.
You can check here for the Bug MAX Effect List. Click the Bug MAX Effect List to check!
Check here for how many BUG MAX units are required to active Bug MAX Effects
Now you can challenge the Bug MAX Effect tutorial. Challenge?
